installCommand: cd ../.. && npx -y pnpm@9.15.4 install --no-frozen-lockfile && cd apps/app && PRISMA_GENERATE_SKIP_AUTOINSTALL=true PRISMA_SKIP_POSTINSTALL_GENERATE=true npm() { echo 'npm blocked'; return 0; } && export -f npm && ../../node_modules/.bin/prisma generate --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma
